page.title: 01MY LIFE AT DRISSAIG
page.content: When I wake up in the morning and get dressed.I go down-stairs for breakfast.Then usually on school days we have a little time to play before going to school. We walk down to the bottom of our drive and the school car picks us up there.It takes us ten minutes to get to Dalavich and it is three miles to Dalavich.There are three other people who go in the school car --- my sister Fiona,Lorna and Seonaid Cameron and I.The Camerons live in Inverinan which is around five miles from Dalavich. The school opens at 9.30am and closes at 3.30pm.We have three intervals and lunch at school. (Continued on page 2)
